snippet: COHEN--Daniel, dies at 92, Pharmacist, WWII Veteran, husband of Joan Oxhorn, father of Alice, Susan, Ceil, Irene and Roger. Funeral, June 22, 11:30am at Riverside Chapel, 180 W. 76st. 1/3
lead_paragraph: COHEN--Daniel, dies at 92, Pharmacist, WWII Veteran, husband of Joan Oxhorn, father of Alice, Susan, Ceil, Irene and Roger. Funeral, June 22, 11:30am at Riverside Chapel, 180 W. 76st. 1/3
